question: If there is any possibility that any body can make nikah if his or her vakeel is non Muslim or Kafir.
answer:
QUESTION
DETAILS: Q1. Mufti sahib I asked this question 1st time with the serial number 9492 than 2nd time with the number of 9746. If there is any possibility that any body can make nikah if his or her vakeel is non Muslim or Kafir. If it is not possible than how Hadrat Abu Talib was vakeel of Hadrat Mohammad (P.B.U.H). at the time of nikkah. If he was vakeel of Hadrat Mohammad (P.B.U.H) so its mean that he was Muslim at that time, and who said this word first "Alhamdolillahay Rabil A Lameen" Q2. What is the incident of Gadeer.
ANSWER


Share:
1. At the time of his Nikah, Nabi (Sallallaahu Alayhi Wasallam) was 25 years old. He only received prophehood at the age of 40, after which all the laws of Islam were revealed and became applicable. Therefore, Abu Taalib being the Wakeel was prior to the advent of Islam.

2. Please explain the meaning of ?Ghadeer?. We are unaware of what you are referring to.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
